body.name: Hamilton Beach 49915 FlexBrew Trio 2-Way Coffee Maker, Compatible with K-Cup Pods or Grounds, Single Serve & Full 12c Pot, Black with Stainless Steel Accents, Fast Brewing

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Black with Stainless Steel Accents, Fast Brewing

body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 49 mins
features: 3 WAYS TO BREW. Brew a single cup with a K-Cup* pod or coffee grounds or brew up to 12 cups using your favorite ground coffee. To brew one serving, you have the option to brew up to a 10 oz. cup with a pod or brew up to 14 oz., 7" tall travel mug with coffee grounds.

FAST BREWING — BREW A SINGLE CUP IN ABOUT 90 SECONDS. In the morning, every second counts. Unlike 2 way coffee makers of the past, the FlexBrew Trio Coffee Maker prepares a single cup in in about 90 seconds, so you have more time to enjoy your coffee.

BREW 7 SINGLE SERVINGS WITHOUT REFILLING THE 56 OZ. WATER RESERVOIR. Now you can brew multiple cups of coffee without stopping to pour water into the coffee maker — the removable water reservoir saves you time because it needs fewer refills.

5 SINGLE-SERVE SIZES TO CHOOSE FROM: Customize the brewing size to your cup. Simply select 6, 8, 10, 12 or 14 oz. before you brew with ground coffee or choose 6, 8 or 10 oz. when brewing with a pod — you'll get the perfect amount in your cup.

WAKE-UP READY COFFEE WITH EASY-TOUCH PROGRAMMING. When you brew coffee into the 12 cup carafe, you can wake up to hot coffee by setting up Easy-Touch programming the night before. The backlit display makes it easy to view the time and settings.
*K-Cup is a registered trademark of Keurig Green Mountain, Inc. Use of the K-Cup trademark does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by Keurig Green Mountain, Inc.
body.description: Enjoy 3 ways to brew with the Hamilton Beach® FlexBrew® Trio Coffee Maker. Brew with a K-Cup®* pod or ground coffee into a cup or travel mug or brew 12 cups into the carafe with ground coffee. Includes reusable filter and has stainless steel accents.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research and rigorous testing to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach FlexBrew Trio Single Serve and 12 Cup Coffee Maker with Stainless Steel Accents and Gold-Tone Reusable Filter The Hamilton Beach FlexBrew Trio Coffee Maker lets you brew 3 ways and features stainless steel accents for sleek style. On the single-serving side, you'll enjoy fast brewing every morning because it brews a single cup in about 90 seconds and brews 7 servings without refilling the 56 oz. water reservoir. You can brew a single cup with your favorite brand of pod or brew with ground coffee. Using a pod lets you brew 6, 8, or 10 oz. of coffee, and brewing with coffee grounds lets you choose from 5 brewing sizes: 6, 8, 10, 12 or 14 oz. On the carafe side, you can brew up to 12 cups with your favorite coffee grounds. Multiple brewing options: 5 single-serve sizes to choose from Set up wake-up ready coffee with Easy-Touch programming Pour yourself a cup before brewing is finished with Auto Pause & Pour, and 2 hours after brewing, the power automatically shuts off Includes 12 cup glass carafe, gold-tone reusable filter, single-serve pod holder, single-serve brew basket and a cup rest with a storage area for either

3 Ways to Brew Brew a single cup with a pod or coffee grounds or brew up to 12 cups using your favorite ground coffee. To brew one serving, you have the option to brew up to a 10 oz. cup with a pod or brew up to 14 oz., 7" tall travel mug with coffee grounds. Fast Brewing — Brew a Single Cup in About 90 Seconds In the morning, every second counts. The Hamilton Beach FlexBrew Trio Coffee Maker prepares a single cup in about 90 seconds, so you have more time to enjoy your coffee. Brew 7 Single Servings without Refilling the 56 oz. Water Reservoir Now you can brew multiple cups of coffee without stopping to pour water into the coffee maker — the removable water reservoir saves you time because it needs fewer refills.

5 Single-Serve Sizes to Choose From Customize the brewing size to your cup. Simply select 6, 8, 10, 12 or 14 oz. before you brew with ground coffee or choose 6, 8 or 10 oz. when brewing with a pod — you'll get the perfect amount in your cup. Wake-Up Ready Coffee with Easy-Touch Programming When you brew coffee into the 12 cup carafe, you can wake up to hot coffee by setting up Easy-Touch programming the night before. The backlit display makes it easy to view the time and settings. Includes Gold-Tone Reusable Filter There's no need to buy paper filters again. Simply fill the gold-tone reusable filter with coffee before brewing into the carafe and discard the wet grounds later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy I bought it.
reviews.reviewText: I've bought a thousand things on Amazon and left maybe 5 reviews, but I have to give this coffee maker 5 stars and sing it's praises.Yes, it's easy to use, yes it's versatile, yes it saves space, but most importantly it makes delicious coffee. I've had Keurigs, I've had Bunns, but this makes the best tasting coffee from a pod that I've ever had. Using a standard k pod on the bold setting makes a perfect tasting 12oz. cup of coffee with great flavor that can totally stand up to the half and half and Splenda that I add. It has turned my son from a casual coffee sipper to a full fledged dedicated drinker now.It makes great pots of coffee too. I'll never buy a different coffee maker again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, love it
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because it had a lot of features. Of course it takes KEURIG pods that I liked. It also has an attachment to where if you like to make hot tea it comes with its own tea strainer. The pot is wonderful if you have many guests and want to save on the pods. The water container in the back is perfect. Easy to get to no fuss in replacing the water. My girlfriend gave me a Britta as a gift, so I fill it with water and it has its strainer so my machine gets low on water. I popped the top off pour it and Walla.. It’s actually double strained because it does come with an another filter. , so I fill it with water and it has its filter so when the machine gets low on water. I popped the top off pour it and Walla. When other little tip that I absolutely love is that you do not have to wait for the water tank to warm up. The minute you push that button it automatically starts. Last but not least in opening up the top to put your pod in keep in mind that when you close it, you need to press just a little Pressure to wait for it to snap. because it’s new. It will take some time for it just to gently snap on its own but I love it. Enjoy your coffee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good multi function coffee pot
reviews.reviewText: Needed a new coffee pot to replace a single function pod pot. Wanted a dual use one so could get rid of one pot that only did carafes. This dual use pot is fantastic! Easy to set up timer to make a pot next morning, and can make individual cups with either pods or ground coffee in either regular or bold strengths, Very easy to clean as stores no water so no Build up. The keep warm plate works well for a couple of hours to keep coffee hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended and keeps coffee nice and hot!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new coffee pot for the work office. Small office with five employees, but we all drink two to three cups a day. We also had a K-Cup machine for those afternoon cups. I was able to throw away my normal coffee maker and the K-Cup machine which was great.Setup is easy, but changing the time and programming was slightly confusing, but once you figure it out, super easy. Just wait a second for the hour to stop blinking and it moves to the minutes. Same for programming the auto brew for the morning.Coffee tastes great, and the warmer keeps the coffee really hot. Much hotter than a Mr. Coffee brand maker that we got rid of. My one and only complaint is the brew time. The 12-cup maker part makes coffee as excepted, but slower than the Mr. Coffee to brew the same 12 cups. The K-Cup part is the disappointment. The brewing part can house a standard mug or a travel mug. What the instructions don't tell you is no matter how much water you put in the tank for the K-Cup, that is what is coming out. My first cup overflowed and made a mess. As you can imagine, I filled the tank up to full and pressed brew, and then waited, and I mean waited. It takes a solid three to four minutes to start brewing the K-Cup side. Normal K-Cup brewers brew in seconds to a minute at most. Even to heat the water up. However, this coffee maker takes forever. I was able to go to the bathroom, wash a few mugs, and straighten up the kitchen all before the thing made a noise that it was heating up the water. I am really perplexed that the K-Cup part takes so long to brew and that is supposed to be the faster and more convenient option. Baffles me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works for me
reviews.reviewText: We had one I liked it and it stopped working. I use the cups every day when I stopped working I used the pot side while looking for another one. Finally decided to try amazon and they were cheaper than even Olies. So I bought it and use it every day. The cup side is easy peasy have never used the pot side yet but I love it. It makes coffee just like the old one and it taste the same.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars One-cup brewer is garbage.
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like this product. I also wanted to brew one cup at a time without filling the landfill with plastic Keurig K-cups (no, they don't recycle them, even though they say they do), so I loved the idea of the one-cup brew basket that comes with the unit. Problem is, it produces a "needle" warning on every use, even though I only fill the basket to the level indicated. Brewing one cup of coffee takes multiple attempts, 100% of the time. And, the coffee it produces is weak, despite being on the "Bold" setting. Also, filling the one-cup reservoir is a gigantic mess producing pain in the butt if you keep your coffee pot under an upper kitchen cabinet. You have to reach behind the unit to fill it, guaranteeing spillage. And, it only holds one-cup of water! Why not multiple cups of water and dispense only one cup at a time like every other K-cup brewer??? Can't recommend this product to anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The coffee is good no matter whether we use the decanter or the one-cup. We don't buy the capsules, but know we can if we want. We instead use the little basket for one cup so we can use our own coffee. We like that we can choose the size of cup. It actually has a delay brew that works. We also like that you can choose a regular or bold brew. Best of all, you can buy extra brew baskets if you need to from the company (not where you purchased it), and you can actually contact if you need help. I wish the warranty was longer, but if you clean it regularly or have soft water, it hopefully will last longer than a year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and reliable
reviews.reviewText: We really like this coffee pot. We’ve actually ordered two!!It is so great to have the option of a single cup or an entire pot, and the unit is really not a lot larger than a regular pot in regards to the space it takes up.We enjoy the built in filter, the option of brew strength, and the ability to set a brew time.
I hadn't been enjoying coffee for months so I thought I should give this a try. I love it. Both the brewed coffee and the K pod coffee taste great. Very happy with my purchase. I highly recomend.
No lo compren. A veces trabaja a veces no.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best coffee maker I have ever owned!!
reviews.reviewText: I have only owned this coffee maker for 3-4 months now but I love this machine!! It comes with a reusable metal filter for both the carafe and the single cup makers. It makes fantastic flavor and is the exact some tasting no matter which way you make it, a pot, a single cup or if you use a K-cup. I will say you do have to fine-tune your measurements for the ground coffee but the overall operation of the machine is super easy with no more than a 3 button to a single button operation.The machine is fully programmable so you can wake up to that great morning coffee smell. You can even have it set to fill your traveler's mug so you can avoid those crazy morning drive-thrus at Tims. I have yet to get a blockage on it but I am anal when it comes to cleaning my equipment. I also bought a 3-drawer, 36 k-cup holder from Amazon that sits directly below the machine and looks like the two were meant for one another. It keeps the k-cups out of sight and gives the overall appearance a little more professional look.I have found only 2 cons with this machine as nothing is ever perfect.First, the screen for the clock and programming, although really bright and clear, it shines through a tinted plastic that makes it almost disappear completely if you do not look directly at the right angle. So there are times I can't see the clock or it's hard to make out the display when I sit at my kitchen table.Secondly, my machine has gotten louder in the first 2-3 weeks when it was heating, brewing and finishing the cycle, the noise just got louder and louder. It's not so loud it's annoying or that it may obstruct your morning conversation with the kids or your spouse but it did get significantly louder and so I have to mention that. It was dead quiet when I first started using it, you could barely hear it but now you almost feel like your in a bistro now lol.That aside, this is an astounding coffee percolator. I love the carafe or single cup or even k-cup options. I love the automatic shutoff of the coffee warming plate for the carafe. It shuts off after 2 hours have passed after brewing. I love the 2 separate water level viewing glasses as they are super clear. The disassembly and cleaning of the machine are so easy you could get your four years old to do it, heck even gets the husband to do it. I love the fact you get reusable brewing screens. Being able to program my morning brew that's another pro and above all else, for the price that you will pay for this machine and the flavor and speed you get out of it is simply amazing. Hamilton Beach truly made the definition of value with this machine. I also got the extended 3year warranty on top of the manufacturer 1 year warranty just in case this too good to be true machine doesn't stand the test of time but at this rate I have nothing but positive thoughts that this machine will be here with me for at least another 5 years as long as no one steals it!!

A friend without prime did research and had me buy him one of these.Fast forward a few years and my Keurig died on me, and I was in the market for another machine.This can brew up to 12 cups of coffee on one side of the machine.And it can brew K-Cup single serve pods on the other side.Each side has it's own single use water reservoir, with an amount indicator.The coffee pot side has a gold basket insert, so you don't need filters.Dumping the used coffee grinds might be easier with a filter, but then not needing to buy them is nice too.Pressing the I/O (brew/power) button without water in the coffee pot side has the hot plate (stay warm function) enable for another couple of hours.The coffee pot side can be programmed to start your pot at whatever time of day you'd like.Just pre-fill the water level and of course the amount of coffee into the gold basket.The single serve side can take any K-Cup.Beneath the shelf for a cup/mug is a storage bit.Inside that is a pocket for using ground coffee, if you prefer one cup of coffee but don't want to use a K-Cup.The machine is a little louder than my Keurig was, and it takes a little longer to brew.Not massively so, but noticeably.The coffee is definitely warmer than the Keurig machine.Without cream it would be too hot to drink immediately, but with just a little cream it is drinkable but on the hot side.Either side has the option for regular or bold brew.Aside from the toggle (between single serve or carafe), one set of controls runs the entire machine.I've only been using it for a few weeks, but it feels sturdy and well made.Much more solid than my Keurig machine felt.I agree with my friend, that this is a great machine.They've had theirs for four years and are still using it on a daily basis.

The Hamilton Beach FlexBrew Trio 2-Way Coffee Maker offers versatile brewing options in one convenient machine. Compatible with both K-Cup pods and ground coffee, it allows you to enjoy single-serve cups or a full 12-cup pot of coffee.With its sleek black and silver design, this coffee maker adds a modern touch to any kitchen. The inclusion of a permanent gold-tone filter eliminates the need for disposable filters, saving you time and money.While the FlexBrew Trio provides flexibility in brewing options, some users may find that the single-serve side requires a bit of experimentation to achieve their desired strength and taste. Additionally, the machine's size may take up some counter space.Overall, the Hamilton Beach FlexBrew Trio Coffee Maker is a versatile and convenient choice for coffee lovers. It receives a solid four-star rating for its functionality and brewing options. Enjoy the flexibility and convenience of this coffee maker in your daily coffee routine.
